meanings.sent1: The aleuronic layer of the seed protects it from harm.
meanings.sent2: The aleuronic cells in the grain store nutrients for growth.
meanings.sent3: The aleuronic coating on the seed made it look like it was wearing a tiny armor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as aleuronic as the sun shining through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The aleuronic nature of the plant's leaves made them glisten in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the outer layer of a grain.
meanings.sent1: The aleuronic covering on the grain provides protection from pests.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often remove the aleuronic layer before processing grains.
meanings.sent3: The aleuronic husk on the grain made it look like it was wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: The aleuronic shield of the grain defended it against the elements.
meanings.sent5: The aleuronic outer layer of the grain shimmered in the light.
